name: Slimy (Lukas Green)
description:
Small puzzle game where you play as a slime.

Game made for 2 GameJams where the themes were: You are the monster, Out of reach, Re-do.

https://itch.io/jam/chill-game-devs-game-jam-3

https://itch.io/jam/pb-game-jam-5

1) You are the monster = You play as a slime

2) Out of reach = You need to complete specific puzzles, otherwise the goal is out of reach

3) Re-do = You have to restart the level each time you fail or die
